snippet: A graphic video circulating in Kabul recalls the Taliban’s five-year reign in Afghanistan, when people accused of crimes were shot in front of crowds that packed the capital’s stadium.
abstract: Video circulating in Kabul, Afghanistan, shows Taliban publicly executing a woman accused of adultery; armed with an assault rifle, man identified as her husband approaches the woman from behind and shoots her before a cheering mob of villagers; video recalls the Taliban's five-year reign when public executions were advertised and attendance was expected.

byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG and SANGAR RAHIMI

lead_paragraph: A graphic video circulating in Kabul recalls the Taliban’s five-year reign in Afghanistan, when people accused of crimes were shot in front of crowds that packed the capital’s stadium.

headline.seo: Execution Video Recalls Reign of Taliban in Afghanistan
headline.main: In Video of Execution, Reign of Taliban Recalled
headline.print_headline: In Video of Execution, Reign of Taliban Recalled
